sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-app id="app">
    <v-main>
        <router-view/>
    </v-main>
  </v-app>
</template>
<script>
import axios from "axios";

export default {
	mounted() {
		const data = this.$store.getters.credentials
		const queryString = `username=${data.username}&password=${data.password}`
		axios.post(this.$store.getters.API + '/login', queryString, {
			headers: {
				'content-type': 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded'
			},
			withCredentials: true
		})
		.then(response => {
			this.$store.commit('setNonce', response.data)
		})
	}
}
</script>
<style lang="scss">
$bg: #e3e0e7;
body {
	overflow-x: scroll;
    font-family: Avenir, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
    -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
    -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
	background: $bg;
	text-align: left;
	padding: 8px;
}
#app {
	background: $bg;
	.v-btn {
		text-transform: capitalize;
		// box-shadow: 0 2px 4px rgba(100, 100, 100, .15);
	}
}
</style>
